level.text: Each applicant for a license under this chapter shall:
Submit a completed application on a form prescribed by the Commission, including the following information:
The applicant’s legal name, and any assumed names or aliases used by the applicant;
The applicant’s date of birth; and
Other information requested by the application.
Submit with the application two (2) recent passport-type photographs of the applicant’s face measuring two inches by two inches (2”x2”); and
Pay the required application fee, if any.
An applicant for a license, other than an applicant for a license as a contestant, shall prove to the satisfaction of the Commission that the applicant is at least twenty-one (21) years of age.

The Commission shall include on each application form for a license or permit issued pursuant to this chapter a notice to the effect that “The making of a false statement on this application or on documents required by this application is punishable by criminal penalties.”
